Description: A pair of gauntlets adorned with sapphire gems, providing magical protection to the wearer.

Description: A pair of gauntlets made from cobalt metal, providing solid defense without weighing down the wearer.

Description: A pair of gauntlets imbued with the power of ice, increasing the wearer's magical attack.

Name: Frostbite Gauntlets
Description: A pair of gauntlets that freeze the air around them, increasing the wearer's physical attack power.

Description: A simple pair of navy blue gauntlets, offering basic protection to the wearer's hands.

Description: A pair of gauntlets with a cerulean hue, increasing the wearer's endurance.

Name: Oceanic Gauntlets
Description: A pair of gauntlets that evoke the depths of the ocean, increasing the wearer's health points.

Name: Cyan Gauntlets
Description: A pair of light cyan gauntlets, providing basic protection to the wearer's hands.
